name: Rosa
body:
### Welcome to ROSA.
ROSA is an RDF and Ontology conStraints extrActor for RDF data implemented in Scala and Apache Spark.

### Pre-requisites

- [Apache Spark](http://spark.apache.org/)
- [Scala](http://www.scala-lang.org/)

### Compiling from sources

To build from scratch.
```bash
mvn package -DskipTests
```

### Author
[Emir Mu√±oz](http://emunoz.org)
